Title: Requests to Participate
Description: The total number of unique requests to participate received

Title: Bids
Description: The total number of unique bids received (prior to any being discounted for not meeting essential criteria).

Title: Valid Bids
Description: The total number of unique bids received that were considered valid against relevant criteria (either of the bidder, or the bid submission itself). All valid bids should be consider during the tender evaluation stage.

Title: Bidders
Description: The total number of unique organiastions or consortia submitting bids  (prior to any being discounted for not meeting essential criteria).

Title: Qualified Bidders
Description: The total number of unique organiastions or consortia passing the qualification stage of the evaluation process.

Title: Disqualified Bidders
Description: The total number of unique organiastions or consortia that did not pass the qualification stage of the evaluation process.

Title: Electronic Bids
Description: The number of bids received by electronic means.

Title: Bids from SMEs
Description: The number of bids received from Small and Medium Sized Enterprises

Title: Bids from Foreign Firms
Description: The number of bids received from bidders from outside the country where the tender is issued.

Title: Bids from firms in other EU Member States
Description: The number of bids received from bidders from outside the country where the tender is issued, but based within an EU Member State.
